## blockRendering.Icon.(constructor)

An object containing information about the space an icon takes up during rendering.

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(constants: ConstantProvider, icon: BlocklyIcon);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  constants | [ConstantProvider](./blockly.blockrendering.constantprovider.md) | The rendering constants provider. |
|  icon | [BlocklyIcon](./blockly.iicon.md) | The icon to measure and store information for. |
